All Classes

Class Description
AbstractFactory<T>
Interface used to instantiate various objects
AddTask
Class implementing runnable which executes the task of adding a product in the products array of the auction house
Administrator
The Administrator is the one that has the ability to create threads for adding products, and to add any type of object to the auction house.
Antique
An Antique type of product
Auction
The class for storing all the relevant information about an auction, like how many participants are needed for the auction to start, or the maximum steps of bidding that are executed
AuctionHouse
The AuctionHouse class is based on the Singleton Design Pattern and holds all the fields necessary for the auctions
Broker
The Broker is the one that actively performs the interaction with both the client and the auction house.
Client
Clients implement the Observer interface and are the ones that take part in an Auction
ClientBuilder
Based on the Builder design pattern, used for easily instantiating client objects
ClientFactory
Factory used for created specific subclasses of client
Clothing
Clothing type of product, this class extends Product
Color
Utility class that provides string constants used for producing a colored output in the terminal
ColorType
Enum for the possible color types of a painting
CompanyType
Enum for the possible company types a legal person can work at
DeleteTask
Class implementing runnable which executes the task of deleting a product from the products array of the auction house
DuplicateRequestException
Exception for duplicated requests for the same product, by the same client
Employee
Abstract class describing an employee, extended by both the Administrator and the Broker
ExampleTest
A JUnit5 testing class
FactoryProvider
Class for providing a specific factory implementation for an object
Furniture
Furniture is a subclass of Product
Information
The class used for mediating the communication between the brokers and the clients
InvalidProductRequest
Exception for invalid requests for a product, for example, the client can not bid enough
Jewelry
Jewelry subclass of Product
JSONDataException
Exception for a faulty JSON file in which all the parameters cannot be read
JSONReader
Class for parsing and reading a JSON file
LegalPerson
A subclass of Client
Main
The main class of the program, that calls the two additional readers, one for JSON and one for XLSX
NaturalPerson
A subclass of the client
Observer
Observer interface, that are updated every time the subjects executes an important action, designed based on the Observer design pattern
Painting
Painting subclass of Product
Product
The Product class for describing what the clients can buy from the auction house
ProductBuilder
Class used for building Product objects
ProductFactory
A Factory used for instantiating product objects
ReadTask
Class implementing runnable which executes the task of reading all the products in the products array of the auction house
Subject
Subject interface, that can notify observers of the events happened in the auction
UnknownClientException
Exception for trying to create an unknown client subclass
UnknownDataException
Exception for trying to create an unknown subtype for an object
UnknownProductException
Exception for trying to create an unknown subtype of a product
XLSXReader
Class for reading the request from an XLSX Excel file
